settings.customreview_text: Pumpkin üéÉ spice üòç Yummy üòã I don't know how sweet people drink their drinks because I'm a sugary sweet type and 3 pumps of pumpkin was more than enough for my 16 oz dirty chai. settings.customreview_text: A boost to my morning coffee or my afternoon esspresso Good price, good taste.
Great syrup Tastes great, doesn't crystallize like Torani, bottle is plastic, so no worries of breakage, and a great price. Totally recommend.
